description:
Cursed by the Skull Heart to never grow up, Annie (alongside her trusty remote parasite Sagan) at long last joins the Skullgirls roster!

Features:

- Quiet on set! Unlock Sound Stage 15, the set of her hit TV show.
- Costume change! Try out 29 different palettes and find your favorite fit.
- Binge her all new Story Mode as she continues her centuries long quest to destroy the Skull Heart once and for all.
- Master her moveset via brand new Character Tutorials!
name: Skullgirls: Annie
